quotes.quote: Someone told me this: "Nothing is "forever" in human relationships". That might be true, but it sounds awfully lonely. But I realized today... If there really is no such thing as "forever"... Then having someone important is the happiest thing one can attain in life.

Someone told me this: ""Nothing is ""forever"" in human relationships"". That might be true, but it sounds awfully lonely. But I realized today... If there really is no such thing as ""forever""... Then having someone important is the happiest thing one can attain in life.
